pages.text: $(li)It is rumored that the Iceologers were $(l:patchouli:illagers/frostmancer)Frostmancers$(/l) corrupted by their own magic, because of this, Illagers exiled them of their lands.$(br)$(li)The few Iceologers still alive appears rarely in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_taiga)Snowy Taigas$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_taiga)Snowy Mountains$(/l) or in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_taiga)Snowy Tundras$(/l) during the night.
On death they maybe drop the $(l:patchouli:weapons/wand_of_freezing)Wand of Freezing$(/l).

$(li)They can inflict you the Frostbite effect too, slowing your walking speed in 80% and damaging you every second.$(br)$(li)They can summon big ice block on you, when those hit you, inflicts a lot of damage.
